To obtain a token:

  1. Log in to your Ntfy instance.
  2. Click on Account
  3. Go under, on Access tokens and click on the button icon to copy your Token or CREATE ACCESS TOKEN if you do not have
  4. Please pay attention to the expiration time when copying/creating a Token.
  4. Copy your access token & and paste them into the fields below.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
Title: Title
The topic/channel to send the notificati: The topic/channel to send the notification to, e.g. test1
The priority of the notification (1-5). 1 is lowest priority.
The absolute URL to your icon, e.g. http: The absolute URL to your icon, e.g. https://example.com/communityIcon_xnt6chtnr2j21.png
Add Action buttons to notifications, see: Add Action buttons to notifications, see https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#action-buttons
You can define which URL to open when a: You can define which URL to open when a notification is clicked, see https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#click-action
Let ntfy send messages at a later date,: Let ntfy send messages at a later date, e.g. 'tomorrow, 10am', see https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#scheduled-delivery
Authorization headers are injected autom: Authorization headers are injected automatically from your connection.
Enable for files like PDFs, images, etc..
